name: Resilience of the Scourge
tooltip:
Resilience of the Scourge
Item Level 60
Binds when picked up
Requires Level 60
Use: Permanently adds to a shoulder slot item increased healing done by magical spells and effects up to 31 and also increases your mana regen by 5 mana per 5 sec.
Dropped by: Sapphiron
Drop Chance: 49.09%
